jodd.madvoc

Class Madvoc

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.Madvoc

  • public class Madvoc
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintain the lifecycle of a Madvoc WebApp.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static Madvoc get(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        Returns Madvoc instance from servlet context. May return null indicating Madvoc is not yet initialized.

      • setWebAppClassName

        public void setWebAppClassName(java.lang.String webAppClass)
        Sets WebApp class name.

      • setWebAppClass

        public void setWebAppClass(java.lang.Class webAppClass)
        Sets WebApp class.

      • setMadvocConfiguratorClassName

        public void setMadvocConfiguratorClassName(java.lang.String madvocConfiguratorClassName)
        Sets the name of the class that is going to be used for configuration of user actions.

      • setMadvocConfiguratorClass

        public void setMadvocConfiguratorClass(java.lang.Class madvocConfiguratorClass)
        Sets class that will be used for configuring the user actions.

      • setParamsFiles

        public void setParamsFiles(java.lang.String[] paramsFiles)

      • configureWith

        public void configureWith(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        Configures Madvoc by reading context init parameters.

      • webapp

        public WebApp webapp()
        Returns web application once it is started.

      • startWebApplication

        public WebApp startWebApplication(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        Creates and starts new Madvoc web application. Madvoc instance is stored in servlet context. Important: servletContext may be null, when web application is run out from container.

      • stopWebApplication

        public void stopWebApplication()
        Stops Madvoc web application.

      • createWebApplication

        protected WebApp createWebApplication()
        Creates WebApp.

      • loadMadvocParams

        protected Props loadMadvocParams(java.lang.String[] patterns)
        Loads Madvoc parameters. New Props is created from the classpath.

      • resolveMadvocConfigClass

        protected void resolveMadvocConfigClass()
        Loads Madvoc component that will be used for configuring the user actions. If class name is null, default AutomagicMadvocConfigurator will be used.
